title: aXe FireFox Plugin
creator: Deque Systems, Inc.
description: Automated tool to find Accessibility defects on your web site by using the aXe Firefox extension. Drop the aXe on your accessibility defects!
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
